external_games.name: Asahina Mikuru no Yoko Scroll Action

name: Asahina Mikuru no Yoko Scroll Action
summary: Play as Mikuru Asahina with a machine gun. Shoot rabbit, cat, pig and avoiding any obstacles. Asahina Mikuru no Yoko Scroll is an action game based on popular anime series Haruhi Suzumiya no Yuutsu.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Asahina Mikuru [朝比奈ミクルの横スクロールアクション] Game Sample - PC/Doujin
